loader.greyLeftTop: For information, click a hotspot on the product.
loader.greyLeftBottom: Or choose a numbered feature button
loader.greyRightTop: To explore the product in 3D, use these mouse controls.

onloadCopy.point1text1: Lenovo ThinkSystem SR665 V3 is the optimum 2U, two-socket server. The SR665 V3 has the performance and flexibility to manage a complex set of workloads like data management, analytics, virtualization, cloud, and AI. The two 4th Gen AMD EPYC™ processors and the latest DDR5 memory maximize the performance of this 2U server.

point2text.point2text1: Up to 8 x 2.5” drives (shown) Up to 4 x 3.5” drives (model dependent)

point3text.point3text2:
(model dependent)
for U.2 drive or SAS drive or SATA drives
point3text.point3text3: Operator panel with optional Diagnostic LCD Panel
point3text.point3text6: Pull-out information tab with XCC Network Access Label

point4text.point4text7: Up to 12x 3.5-inch hot-swap drive bays (SAS/SATA or AnyBay)

point5text.point5text1: The ThinkSystem SR850 supports up to 2 backplanes, each supporting up to 8x 2.5” drives.The AnyBay backplane supports four SAS/SATA and four AnyBay slots each for SAS/SATA/NVMe drives.

pointtext6.point6text7: Side by Side M.2 boot module
pointtext6.point6text9: The SR650 V2 can accommodate up to 3 double-width GPUs or up to 8 single-wide GPUs (shown).

point7text.point7text1:
Supports 2 or 4 second generation
Intel® Xeon® Processor Scalable Family CPUs.

point8text.point8text8: 4x 3.5-inch hot-swap drive bays with 2 slots (as shown). The configuration also supports 2x 3.5-inch hot-swap drive bays with 4 slots, or no rear drive bays and 8 slots. Also supports 2x 7mm hot-swap drive bays instead of one of the lower slots.

point9text.point9text1: This expansion tray has a unique camming mechanism that requires very little effort to single-handedly install or remove. The toolless, self-guiding design provides superior reliability, usability, and serviceability.

point10text.point10text1: Lenovo XClarity is foundation software for data centers who put a premium on IT efficiency and precision execution.
point10text.point10text6: Centralized resource-management solution: Reduces complexity, speeds response, and enhances availability of Lenovo ThinkSystem and ThinkAgile solutions.
point10text.point10text7: Provides centralized monitoring, management, and analytics for environments with large number of devices. It leverages existing XClarity Administrator's across multiple sites to view overall health, collect device inventory and health summaries, drill down into device details, view event and audit logs, and apply updates to managed resources.
point10text.point10text8: Enables integration into existing IT applications: software plugins provide functionality to manage infrastructure in the console of the software tools that are currrently in use.
point10text.point10text9: Embedded provisioning tool that allows quick and easy configuration of server hardware & deployment of operating system.
point10text.point10text11: Embedded management engine in ThinkSystem server. Designed to standardize, simplify and automate foundation server management tasks.

point11text.point11text1: The SR665 V3 features one or two 4th Generation AMD EPYC™ Processors with high core counts and PCIe lane counts per socket providing extreme configuration flexibility and the ultimate in processing power needed for enterprise-class performance.

point111text.point111text1: The server supports a configuration of three front-accessible slots (2x PCIe 4.0 FH slots, 1x OCP 3.0 slot), along with 16x 2.5-inch hot-swap drives
point111text.point111text2: The server also supports a configuration of 10 slots at the rear of the server (6x FH, 4x LP)

point12text.point12text1: The design of the 3.5-inch drive configuration includes support for a mid-chassis drive cage of 4x 3.5-inch hot-swap drives. The cage rotates upwards to allow easy access to the drives.

point13text.point13text1: Simplify your IT transformation and grow your business your way In today's world, change can happen overnight. Lenovo's Solution Services Group offers a complete suite of answers to even your most challenging business questions.
point13text.point13text6: Our proven experts guide you on your digital transformation and help you reach your unique strategic and business goals through:
point13text.point13text11: Accelerate time to productivity to focus on your customers and growing business.
point13text.point13_li4_2: Hardware Environments Tailored To Your Specific Business Needs

point14text.point14text1: The design of the 2.5-inch drive configuration includes support for a mid-chassis drive cage of 8x 2.5-inch hot-swap drives. The cage rotates upwards to allow easy access to the drives.

point15text.point15text1: The SR665 V3 supports high-performance GPUs:</br> • Up to 3 double-width GPUs, 350W each</br> • Up to 6 single-width GPUs, 150W each</br> • Up to 8 single-width low-profile GPUs, 75W each (shown)

point16text.point16text1: For some configurations such as the 16x 2.5-inch model shown can be configured with an integrated pull-out LCD diagnostics panel for active alerts and system status.

point17text.point17text1: The performance heatsinks are designed to provide improved thermal management by drawing heat away from the processors to auxiliary radiators.

point18text.point18text1: All configurations have a special port to connect an External Diagnostics Handset with an LCD display.

note.point19text:
Optional External Diagnostics Port
Optional VGA port
Pull-out information tag
USB 3.1 Gen 1 port
Operator panel
.
USB port 2.0 with XCC management
Up to 24x 2.5-inch hot-swap drive bays (SAS/SATA, NVMe or AnyBay)

point20text.point20text1: The server offers a dedicated port to connect an optional External Diagnostics Handset with an LCD display for a variety of system status functions.

point21text.point21text01: The server offers a dedicated port to connect to an optional External Diagnostics Handset with an LCD display for a variety of system status functions.
point21text.point21text02: XClarity Mobile is available as an app for Android and iOS devices for single-server management functions, including:
point21text.point21text3: Monitor audit events, alerts, and jobs
point21text.point21text4: Trigger the collection of diagnostic data. Download service logs
point21text.point21text5: View and change the IPv4 and IPv6 settings
point21text.point21text6: Specify boot order and one-time boot settings
point21text.point21text7: Power the server on or off, restart the server, or trigger NMI
